actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to increase the tariff on imported copper and to exclude copper imports from the Generalized System of Preferences created by the Trade Act of 9174.

summary.text: Copper Tariff Act - Title I: Amendments to the Tariff Schedules of the United States - Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to increase the customs duty on copper. Title II: Amendments to the Trade Act of 1974 - Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to exclude certain copper imports from the Generalized System of Preferences.

titles.title: A bill to increase the tariff on imported copper and to exclude copper imports from the Generalized System of Preferences created by the Trade Act of 9174.
